channel.title: Help Me ! It's Got To Be Simple!
channel.description:
Hi, At the moment i've got this portal for a quest. You have to jump into it and it makes your magic level to level 50. Then to make it so you can't have more exp. I've got -
[code]if (playerLevel[6] <= 50) addSkillXP(0, 6);[/code]
But when i get to 51, 52 All the way up to 99 it lets you get exp.
Is there someway i can make the 51 - 99 not get exp aswell ?
Please help,
Thankyou
Darther
